title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The epic conclusion to the Marvel saga.
synopsis: The Avengers assemble to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.

title: Parasite
description: A South Korean masterpiece about class disparity.
synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer.
synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher turns to cooking meth to secure his family's future.

title: The Dark Knight
description: A gripping tale of Batman's fight against the Joker.
synopsis: Batman faces off against the Joker in a battle for Gotham's soul.

title: Inception
description: A mind-bending thriller about dreams within dreams.
synopsis: A thief who enters the dreams of others must perform the impossible task of inception.
